title: What Lula’s Victory in Brazil Means for Climate
description: The president-elect once helped slash deforestation rates in the Amazon rainforest. He says he wants to do it again.
dc:creator: Manuela Andreoni
media:credit: Victor Moriyama for The New York Times
media:description: Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva, now president-elect, at a campaign rally on Saturday.
